originalText.text: Hi August and Jorge—Thank you so very, very much for the work you did to get an arbitration settlement for me.  You were at all times professional, knowledgable and kind in our conversations regarding this matter throughout 2023.  These are a wonderful combination of attributes to have as law partners—and although I have never met you in person, I could tell by the way you spoke to me that you were the right law firm to hire for resolution of this matter. I am certain that much success and many blessings will continue to come to you in the future with your dedication to transparency and to your clients' best interests.

originalText.text: August's team represented me and my family in a recent case. They are professional and well informed on the situation. They guided us through the entire process in detail, answered all our questions in a promptly manner. Thank you very much for the service!

originalText.text: August Iorio was great to work with.  Very professional and experienced in the area I needed him.  Kept me informed throughout the process. Would use him again.  No regrets.

originalText.text: My experience working with this firm was exceptional. They are very knowledgeable in their field, as well as professional and sincere with their client’s needs. I would highly recommend to anyone. Thank you August & Jorge!
